titleStmt.title: The anatomie of Ananias: or, Gods censure against sacriledge With a breife scholie vpon Psalm. 83. concerning the same subiect. By Roger Gostvvyke Batchelour of Diuinitie, and minister of Sampford Courtnie in the countie of Deuonsh.
titleStmt.author: Gostwick, Roger, b. 1567 or 8.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Cantrell Legge, printer to the Vniversitie of Cambridge,

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Deo & Ecclesiae D.D.
Running title reads: The anatomie of Ananias and Sapphiraes sacriledge.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
